documentation.metadescription: KoolForm is a great form manager which can help you to unload tasks when deal with form. First, it helps you to style/skin your form so that your form appears consistent in all browsers. KoolForm also provides advanced controls such as textbox, button, dropdown, validator so that you can save huge amount of time for your important matters. KoolForm can be integrated seamlessly into your page without any changes to your existing page's layout.

property.name: id
property.longdesc: Get the id of KoolForm. Normally the id of KoolForm will be the id of the real form concatenated with "_manager".

method.name: validate
method.longdesc: Sometime you will need to validate the form not just at submission time but others, you just need to call this validate() function, the form input will be validated immediately. Returned value is whether the whole form is valid.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var isvalid =  myform_manager.validate();		
    }
</script>

method.name: get_control
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var txtName = myform_manager.get_control("txtName");
		alert(txtName.get_value());
    }
</script>
